# Species differ in bill and flipper lengths

.pull-left[.tiny-font[
```{r plot-penguins, eval=FALSE}
ggplot(penguins) + 
  aes(
    flipper_length_mm, bill_length_mm,
    color = species
  ) + 
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c(
    Adelie = "darkorange",
    Chinstrap = "purple",
    Gentoo = "cyan4"
  ))
```
